knowledge.question: This protocol is similar to DNS because of the way it maps layer 3 to layer 2 addresses.
explanation: Incorrect: UDP (User Datagram Protocol) is a communication protocol
Incorrect: Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) is an application protocol
Correct: Address Resolution Protocol (ARP) is a procedure for mapping an Internet Protocol (IP) address to a media access control (MAC) address
Incorrect: Internet Protocol Version 4 (IPv4) is a widely used protocol in data communication over different kinds of networks.
